ygData.subject: From eq.stratics.com
ygData.messageBody:
<Disclaimer: This is not my information, I just copied and pasted a post from
the above site's message boards>

The message subject was "Just made a collapsible fishing pole" or some such..

"

Not gonna spoil it for ye all though, ye gotta kill Meldrath for the recipes.


"

Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components for the new
ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become apparent,
as all those rangers go gunning for him :)


**********************************************************************
This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and
intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they
are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify
the system manager.

This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by
MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses.

www.mimesweeper.com
